title: with ryze changes coming to light, I can't wait to obliterate all of you with his overpowered releas
body: I've waited 3 years for this. I simply cannot wait to make everyone scream on the boards about him. he will finally be balanced, as all things should be.

replies.body: Lit. my favorite mage by a long margin.
The last optimistic experiment got shelved; you might want to temper your expectations just a little bit.
Dude I'm just gonna jayce you
once I get all the runes, it will already be too late my friend.
